title: Spot XRP ETFs Outpace Market With 12-Day Inflow Streak Nearing $1B Mark
contentSnippet: The sustained accumulation of capital by spot XRP ETFs is establishing XRP as the fastest-growing major crypto-asset vehicle.

title: Uneasy Stability: Crypto Daybook Americas

title: Bitcoin jumps back above $93K as short liquidations and fresh institutional interest help fuel rebound ahead of Fed meeting
contentSnippet: Bitcoin has surged back above $93,000 as traders brace for next week’s Federal Reserve decision amid lingering macro uncertainty.

title: Crypto Markets Today: Bitcoin Reclaims $93K as Altcoins Stage Rebound
contentSnippet: A broad rally lifted major tokens on Wednesday, with bitcoin and ether bouncing and the majority of altcoins surging, even as ZEC extended a weekly slide.

title: Australian Bitcoin Group Challenges ABC News Over 'Misleading' Coverage
contentSnippet: The ABIB claims that ABC "misrepresented Bitcoin's purpose" and conflated it with criminal activity in its coverage.

title: Binance appoints co-founder Yi He as new co-CEO alongside Richard Teng
contentSnippet: Yi He will lead the company alongside previous solo CEO Richard Teng, the exec announced during Binance Blockchain Week.

title: UK Passes Law Formally Recognizing Crypto as Property
contentSnippet: The Property (Digital Assets etc) Act received Royal Assent on Tuesday, the final step of an act becoming law after being passed by the U.K. Parliament.

title: Cathie Wood’s Ark Invest stocks up on more Coinbase, Bullish and Robinhood shares
contentSnippet: Ark Invest bought another 28,315 Coinbase shares on Tuesday, worth around $7.5 million, as it continued to rebalance its fund weightings.

title: Strategy Faces Possible MSCI Index Removal, Threatening Billions in Outflows: Reuters
contentSnippet: A removal could lead to outflows of up to $8.8 billion if other index providers follow suit because the stock is part of many passive investment products.

title: Bitcoin Short-Term Holder Shakeout Could Accelerate Recovery Above Key Level
contentSnippet: A breakout above $93,000 could trigger a short squeeze, analysts say—accelerating Bitcoin’s recovery amid short-term holder capitulation.

title: Babylon’s Trustless Vaults to Add Native Bitcoin-Backed Lending Through Aave
contentSnippet: Babylon is also planning to introduce Bitcoin-backed DeFi insurance, letting BTC holders earn yield while underwriting risk against hacks and exploits.

title: Investigating DeFi hacks with ‘Code is Law’ co-director James Craig and Wildcat Finance co-founder Laurence Day
contentSnippet: "Code is Law" co-director James Craig and Wildcat Finance co-founder Lawrence Day discuss their experiences with, and the consequences of, major DeFi hacks.

title: UK passes law officially recognizing crypto as third kind of property
contentSnippet: Local industry body CryptoUK said this gives crypto a "clearer legal footing" in related crimes or litigation.

title: Taiwan Authorities Say Island's First Regulated Stablecoin Will Debut Next Year
contentSnippet: Regulators have not decided whether the token will be tied to the Taiwan dollar or the U.S. dollar, a choice that will determine how deeply it tests the island’s currency controls.

title: Eric Trump’s American Bitcoin dips 40% after token lockup expires
contentSnippet: American Bitcoin co-founder Eric Trump said volatility was expected from the expiration and that he will hold onto his shares.

title: BlackRock's Spot Bitcoin ETF Options Secure U.S. Top 10 Ranking With 7.7M Active Contracts
contentSnippet: IBIT options are the ninth largest in the U.S.

title: Yi He, Arguably Crypto's Most Powerful Woman, Becomes Binance’s New Co-CEO
contentSnippet: The new leadership role was announced by the current Binance CEO Richard Teng at Binance Blockchain Week in Dubai.

title: This Bitcoin-Led, Institutionally Anchored Cycle Shows the Three-Month Drop Isn’t a Winter: Glassnode
contentSnippet: Glassnode and Fasanara’s year-end report shows record inflows, rising realized cap, and falling volatility, suggesting the latest pullback is a mid-cycle reset rather than the start of a long downturn

title: Gunmen Steal $85,800 in Trinidad Crypto Ambush as Attacks on Holders Rise
contentSnippet: Armed robberies of crypto buyers are rising globally as criminals abandon digital hacks for brutal in-person confrontations.

title: Anthropic Starts Early IPO Prep Ahead of Possible 2026 Debut: Report
contentSnippet: Anthropic is reportedly exploring a public market debut while chasing a new funding round that could push its valuation past $300 billion.

title: Ethereum Whale Buying Steps Up as Market Rebounds From Heavy Liquidations
contentSnippet: Large holders resumed sizeable Ethereum purchases this week as crypto prices recovered sharply from Monday’s wipeout.

title: Bitfinex-backed Layer 1 Stable unveils tokenomics; mainnet launching next week

title: Justice Department Seizes Domain Linked to Burma-Based Crypto Scam Compound
contentSnippet: The U.S. seizure comes a day after a sanctioned Cambodian group shut branches and froze withdrawals under regulatory pressure.

title: Kalshi becomes CNN’s official partner, integrating prediction market data into programming
contentSnippet: Kalshi data will be integrated across CNN programming, and will be used by its newsroom, data and production team.

title: Grayscale Launches First US Chainlink ETF on NYSE Arca
contentSnippet: The product saw strong first-day trading after a shutdown-enabled filing path and updated SEC listing standards opened the way for its launch.

title: Aave DAO mulls pulling back ‘multichain strategy,’ deprecating zkSync, Metis and Soneium instances
contentSnippet: Aave, the largest decentralized lending protocol, has historically taken a maximalist approach towards deploying on new blockchains.

title: Crypto Winter Is Not Coming, Myriad Users Say
contentSnippet: In a Myriad prediction market, just 9% of respondents expected a crypto winter.

title: ‘Get these done on time:’ Rep. Steil presses regulators on stablecoin law ahead of July 2026 deadline
contentSnippet: After passing a major stablecoin bill into law, Congress is racing to write the rules, with one lawmaker urging them to move quickly.

title: Rizzmas is Back? Christmas Solana Meme Coin Wakes From Hibernation
contentSnippet: As December starts, meme coin traders are decorating their Christmas trees and buying up Rizzmas tokens.

title: Animoca eyes stablecoins, AI, DePIN as it expands focus in 2026: Exec
contentSnippet: Animoca Brands’ Keyvan Peymani says the Web3 gaming company is exploring all segments of the crypto industry, including DePIN, DeFi and AI.

title: Conor McGregor calls out Khabib over NFTs, gets shut down by ZachXBT

title: Memecoin market sinks to 2025 low as $5B wiped out in a day

title: NFT and memecoin markets recover after month-long crypto slump
contentSnippet: NFTs posted selective gains led by blue chips, while memecoins rallied broadly across major names in a sentiment-driven rebound.

title: NFTs hit the brakes: Market cap tanks 46% in just 30 days
contentSnippet: CoinGecko data shows the NFT market value has nearly halved in a month, with even top collections like BAYC and CryptoPunks losing ground.

title: Valve’s Counter-Strike 2 update crashes $5.8B economy, revives NFT debate
contentSnippet: A major update to Counter-Strike 2’s item mechanics wiped nearly $2 billion from its $5.8 billion skin market, igniting debate over central control in gaming.

title: Coinbase splashes $25M to revive a podcast from the last bull run
contentSnippet: Coinbase has paid $25 million for an NFT that compels the once popular crypto podcast UpOnly to restart. Bull market vibes anyone?

title: OpenSea rejects pivot from NFTs, says it’s evolving to ‘trade everything’
contentSnippet: OpenSea CEO Devin Finzer says the platform isn’t abandoning NFTs but expanding into a universal onchain trading hub.

title: Swiss regulator GESPA takes aim at FIFA’s NFT platform in formal complaint
contentSnippet: Switzerland’s nationwide gambling authority said user rewards on the platform feature the element of chance, categorizing them as gambling.

title: Fear returns to the crypto market as $230B vanishes overnight
contentSnippet: Investor sentiment turned sharply bearish as crypto’s fear index plunged to 28, and $230 billion in value evaporated in a single day.
